author: wmtford
body: Just implement the minimal fix suggested by Dmitrijus to prevent the memory leak from the TrackerHitAssociator in CMSSW_7_5_0_pre2.  I'll need to invest some effort to understand the consumes changes made by David Lange and Bill Tanenbaum, before attempting any more ambitious cure.  I also haven't tested anything beyond compilation.  So I leave to reviewers to decide whether to go with this PR as a quick fix or look for something better.
title: TrackerHitAssociator clear maps each new event
